title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a label with a specific font size.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the height of the label does not adjust to match the new font size.
OB: The label height does not adjust to match the new font size when the font size of the label is modified.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size of the label is modified, so that it is justified with the font size.
SR:
1. Create a label with a specific font size.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Verify that the height of the label adjusts to match the new font size.
